page.title: 08STORNOWAY SOUTH - THE CASTLE
page.content: {THE CASTLE COLLEGE The present castle, built around{1818 was once the seat of the island's proprietors and started as a school in {1953. {LEWS CASTLE FURTHER EDUCATION COLLEGE: There are 600 pupils in the college and 50 staff. The college is for pupils from the age of 16 upwards. The college has three main departments; business and general studies, building and engineering, textiles and navigation, hotel and catering. These are now housed in a new building near the castle. {THE LEWS CASTLE SCHOOL There are 178 pupils in the school and 14 staff. Courses cover subjects like technical, construction, catering, office skills and enginering. The school is for pupils aged 14-16.{
